parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: The identity of a partner. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The Unix timestamp when the request is initiated. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, cases sensitive and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated according to different APIs.

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Include error type if the error. Empty if no error

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Include error detail if the error. Empty if no error

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error
